findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting of unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: ReentrancyGuard
findings.description: Smart contracts utilize ReentrancyGuard function to manage re-entrant calls to smart contracts.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Active contract ownership identified which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization related hacks.
